scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name x402-huggingface-playground
scripts.deploy:testnet: cp .env.testnet .env.build && VITE_NETWORK=base-sepolia VITE_API_URL=https://x402-huggingface-testnet.operations-4bf.workers.dev npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name x402-huggingface-playground-testnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet: cp .env.mainnet .env.build && VITE_NETWORK=base VITE_API_URL=https://x402-huggingface-mainnet.operations-4bf.workers.dev npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name x402-huggingface-playground-mainnet
